quiz.question: What is the main idea behind Merge Sort?
options: Divide the array into halves, sort each half, and merge them
Swap adjacent elements until the array is sorted
Select the smallest element and move it to the front
Insert each element into its correct position
quiz.answer: Divide the array into halves, sort each half, and merge them
